queries.queryString:
((_index=sumologic_audit_events or _index=sumologic_system_events))
| where subsystem contains "oar"
| count by eventname
| sort by _count

(_index=sumologic_audit_events or _index=sumologic_system_events)
| json field=_raw "subsystem" as subsystem
| where subsystem contains "oar"
| json field=_raw "eventName" as event_name
| where event_name = "PlaybookExecutionStarted" or event_name = "PlaybookExecutionUpdated"
| json field=_raw "PlaybookExecutionIdentity.name" as playbook_name
| json field=_raw "PlaybookExecutionIdentity.id" as playbook_id
| json field=_raw "eventTime" as event_time
| join (json "eventName","PlaybookExecutionIdentity.name","PlaybookExecutionIdentity.id","eventTime" as event_name,playbook_name,playbook_id,event_time | where event_name="PlaybookExecutionStarted") as e1, 
(json "eventName","PlaybookExecutionIdentity.name","PlaybookExecutionIdentity.id","eventTime" as event_name,playbook_name,playbook_id,event_time | where event_name="PlaybookExecutionUpdated") as e2
on e1.playbook_id=e2.playbook_id
| fields e2__messagetime, e1__messagetime, e1_playbook_name, e2_playbook_name, e1_playbook_id, e2_playbook_id
| formatDate(e1__messagetime, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss", "Etc/UTC") as playbook_start
| formatDate(e2__messagetime, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss", "Etc/UTC") as playbook_end
| e1_playbook_name as playbook_name
| e1_playbook_id as playbook_id
| ((e2__messagetime - e1__messagetime)/1000) as duration_seconds
| count by playbook_id, playbook_name, playbook_start, playbook_end, duration_seconds
| fields -_count

(_index=sumologic_audit_events or _index=sumologic_system_events)
| json field=_raw "subsystem" as subsystem
| where subsystem contains "oar"
| json field=_raw "eventName" as event_name
| where event_name = "PlaybookExecutionStarted" or event_name = "PlaybookExecutionUpdated"
| json field=_raw "PlaybookExecutionIdentity.name" as playbook_name
| json field=_raw "PlaybookExecutionIdentity.id" as playbook_id
| json field=_raw "eventTime" as event_time

| join (json "eventName","PlaybookExecutionIdentity.name","PlaybookExecutionIdentity.id","eventTime" as event_name,playbook_name,playbook_id,event_time | where event_name="PlaybookExecutionStarted") as e1, 
(json "eventName","PlaybookExecutionIdentity.name","PlaybookExecutionIdentity.id","eventTime" as event_name,playbook_name,playbook_id,event_time | where event_name="PlaybookExecutionUpdated") as e2
on e1.playbook_id=e2.playbook_id
| fields e2__messagetime, e1__messagetime, e1_playbook_name, e2_playbook_name, e1_playbook_id, e2_playbook_id
| formatDate(e1__messagetime, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ", "Etc/UTC") as playbook_start
| formatDate(e2__messagetime, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ", "Etc/UTC") as playbook_end
| e1_playbook_name as playbook_name
| e1_playbook_id as playbook_id
| ((e2__messagetime - e1__messagetime)/60000) as playbook_exec_time
| avg(playbook_exec_time) as average_execution_time

(_index=sumologic_audit_events or _index=sumologic_system_events)
| json field=_raw "PlaybookExecutionIdentity.externalType"
| json field=_raw "PlaybookExecution.name"
| json field=_raw "subsystem" as subsystem
| where subsystem contains "oar"
| json field=_raw "eventName" as event_name
| where event_name = "PlaybookExecutionStarted" or event_name = "PlaybookExecutionUpdated"
| json field=_raw "PlaybookExecution.name" as playbook_name
| json field=_raw "PlaybookExecution.id" as playbook_id
| json field=_raw "PlaybookExecution.externalType" as exec_type
| json field=_raw "to.status" as status
| dedup playbook_id
| count by playbook_name, status, playbook_id, exec_type
| limit 10
| fields -_count

(_index=sumologic_audit_events or _index=sumologic_system_events)
| json field=_raw "subsystem" as subsystem
| where subsystem contains "oar"
| json field=_raw "eventName" as event_name
| where event_name = "PlaybookExecutionStarted" or event_name = "PlaybookExecutionUpdated"
| json field=_raw "PlaybookExecution.name" as playbook_name
| json field=_raw "PlaybookExecution.id" as playbook_id
| json field=_raw "to.status" as status
| dedup playbook_name
| where status !="Completed"
| count by playbook_name
| fields -_count

((_index=sumologic_audit_events or _index=sumologic_system_events))
| where subsystem contains "oar"
| where eventname in("AutomationActionStarted","AutomationActionUpdated")
| json field=_raw "AutomationAction.name" as actionName
| where actionName not in("condition", "user choice")
| json field=_raw "AutomationActionIdentity.integration_resource" as integrationResource
| json field=_raw "AutomationAction.status" as status
| json field=_raw "AutomationAction.running_id" as actionId
| json field=_raw "AutomationActionIdentity.type" as playbookNodeType
| json field=_raw "AutomationAction.trigger" as trigger
| json field=_raw "AutomationAction.playbook_name" as playbookName
| json field=_raw "AutomationActionIdentity.name" as playbookNodeName

| json field=_raw "AutomationAction.node_name" as playbookNodeTitle
| if(isNull(playbookNodeTitle), playbookNodeName, playbookNodeTitle) as playbookNodeTitle
| count by actionId, actionName, playbookNodeTitle, integrationResource, status, trigger, playbookName
| sort by _count desc
| fields -_count

((_index=sumologic_audit_events or _index=sumologic_system_events))
| where subsystem contains "oar"
| where eventname in("AutomationActionStarted")
| json field=_raw "AutomationActionIdentity.type" as actionType
| count by actionType

((_index=sumologic_audit_events or _index=sumologic_system_events))
| where subsystem contains "oar"
| where eventname in("AutomationActionStarted")
| json field=_raw "AutomationAction.action_counter" as actionCount
| if(isNull(action_count), 0, action_count) as action_count
| last(actionCount)

((_index=sumologic_audit_events or _index=sumologic_system_events))
| where subsystem contains "oar"
| where eventname in("AutomationActionStarted")
| json field=_raw "AutomationAction.action_counter" as action_count
| if(isNull(action_count), 0, action_count) as action_count
| timeslice 1h
| last(action_count) by _timeslice, action_count
| sort by _timeslice asc

(_index=sumologic_audit_events or _index=sumologic_system_events)
| json field=_raw "subsystem" as subsystem
| where subsystem contains "oar"
| json field=_raw "eventName" as event_name
| where event_name = "PlaybookExecutionStarted" or event_name = "PlaybookExecutionUpdated"
| json field=_raw "PlaybookExecutionIdentity.name" as playbook_name
| json field=_raw "PlaybookExecutionIdentity.id" as playbook_id
| json field=_raw "eventTime" as event_time

| join (json "eventName","PlaybookExecutionIdentity.name","PlaybookExecutionIdentity.id","eventTime" as event_name,playbook_name,playbook_id,event_time | where event_name="PlaybookExecutionStarted") as e1, 
(json "eventName","PlaybookExecutionIdentity.name","PlaybookExecutionIdentity.id","eventTime" as event_name,playbook_name,playbook_id,event_time | where event_name="PlaybookExecutionUpdated") as e2
on e1.playbook_id=e2.playbook_id
| fields e2__messagetime, e1__messagetime, e1_playbook_name, e2_playbook_name, e1_playbook_id, e2_playbook_id
| formatDate(e1__messagetime, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ", "Etc/UTC") as playbook_start
| formatDate(e2__messagetime, "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ", "Etc/UTC") as playbook_end
| e1_playbook_name as playbook_name
| e1_playbook_id as playbook_id
| concat(playbook_name, " (", playbook_id, ")") as executed_playbook
| ((e2__messagetime - e1__messagetime)/60000) as playbook_exec_time
| last(playbook_exec_time) by executed_playbook
